title: Black Screen
body: I have a black screen right after champion select and then it's as if my screen shuts down.. can someone help me please.

replies.body: It sounds like your game might be having a hard time getting you connected to the game server that you were going to be playing on. This can happen sometimes if your network is being blocked by a firewall or improper network settings, so make sure to go through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that doesn't help!
